title: Drawing, "Achilles Taught by Centaur Chiron How to Play Lyre", ca. 1790
title_raw: Achilles Taught by Centaur Chiron How to Play Lyre
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue paper
inscribed: Inscribed: Tetide consegna a' chirone achille per educarlo
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: At left, sea with Thetis and her companions. At right, Chiron and lad in grotto.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Achilles Taught by Centaur Chiron How to Play Lyre", ca. 1790. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3289.
